message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $18,000 is fair. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $18,000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, however, $18,000 is already significantly below the true value of this product. I could meet you halfway at $14,500. This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $14,500 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $12,500.  This is my final offer.
